empower.title: Empower Your Financial Future with us
empower.subtitle: Comprehensive Financial Analytics Dashboard
empower.description: Gain real-time visibility into your financial performance with intuitive dashboards.

trackExpenses.title: Track Your all the Expense Easily
trackExpenses.description: Effortlessly monitor and manage all your expenses with our intuitive tracking system. Stay on top of your finances by easily recording and categorizing expenses, ensuring you have a clear overview of your spending habits.

sendMoney.title: Send Money Across the Globe
sendMoney.description: Transfer money instantly to anywhere in the world with our secure and reliable global payment system.

achieveExcellence.title: Achieve Financial Excellence
achieveExcellence.description: Take control of your financial future with our comprehensive suite of tools designed for success.

integrations.title: Integrate With Your Favorite Tools
integrations.description: Connect with all your favorite financial tools and platforms for a seamless experience.

finalCta.title: Ready to Run your Business Better with us
finalCta.description: Join thousands of businesses that trust our platform for their financial management needs.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your finances.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Manage and track all your financial activities
transactions.noCategories: No categories available. Please create categories first to add transactions.
transactions.noTransactions: No transactions found. Add your first transaction to get started.
transactions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Organize your spending with custom categories
categories.noCategories: No categories available. Create your first category to get started.
categories.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this category?

budget.title: Budget Management
budget.description: Set and track budgets for your spending categories
budget.noBudgetsDescription: Set budgets for your spending categories to track your financial goals.
budget.noCategoriesForBudget: No categories available. Please create categories first.

insights.title: Spending Insights
insights.description: Analyze your spending patterns and get personalized recommendations
insights.highSpendingDescription: {{category}} accounts for {{percentage}}% of your spending. Consider setting a budget limit.
insights.highDailySpendingDescription: You're spending an average of ${{amount}} per day. This could impact your savings goals.
insights.reviewDailyExpenses: Review daily expenses and identify non-essential purchases
insights.spendingIncreasingDescription: Your spending has increased by {{percentage}}% compared to last month.
insights.reviewRecentPurchases: Review recent purchases and identify spending patterns
insights.greatProgressDescription: Your spending has decreased by {{percentage}}% compared to last month.
insights.considerDiversifyingDescription: {{category}} dominates your spending. Consider spreading expenses across more categories.
insights.exploreOtherCategories: Explore other categories for better budget distribution
insights.smallPurchasesDescription: You have {{count}} small purchases totaling ${{amount}}. These add up quickly!
insights.trackSmallPurchases: Track small purchases and consider reducing impulse buys

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and settings
settings.resetDataDescription: Permanently delete all transactions and budgets
settings.makeMeAdminDescription: Click the button below to make yourself an admin. This will give you access to the website administration features.
settings.youAreAdminDescription: You can now access the website administration features in the Settings page.
